mapper.select: select sigungu,bungi,roadname,apartmentname,count(*) from ${tableName} group by sigungu,bungi,roadname,apartmentname order by sigungu desc
mapper.insert: insert into LATLNG (SIGUNGU, BUNGI, LAT,LNG,ROADNAME,APARTMENTNAME) values (#{SIGUNGU},#{BUNGI},#{LAT},#{LNG},#{ROADNAME},#{APARTMENTNAME})
